content.main_text: Learn about serving temperatures for different dishes.
content.section_1_content: Proper serving temperatures ensure food safety and taste quality.
content.section_2_content: Dishes can be served cold, at room temperature, warm, or very hot.
content.section_3_content: Correct temperatures enhance customer experience and comply with health standards.

questions.question_text: What is the serving temperature of {dish_name}?
questions.hint: Check your menu for the listed serving temperature of the dish.
